text: What a great place and vibe!!! It’s a must visit place. The music, ambience, staff, service, everything about it is great. Plus they know how to pour Guinness. Sam and his team are pretty cool.. I went next door (Sam’s other bar) for Sunday roast, food quality was equally spot on. When you’re in Katong, check this place out.
Great bar to drink and dine!! Great place to knows diversity of pub goers!! Highly recommended!! Must try their lamb and ribs!! Guinness is top notch, well pour and serve!
Great Guinness! 9.2/10. Amazing head, super creamy, and poured well by the bossman. What a spot!
great place to bring your friends for a drink, guinness pour was fantastic and food was good as well. had a new place open next door with good cocktails. will come back.

Sam’s bar is the best speak easy in Joo Chiat.. great collection of single malts.. and has a whole lot of other liquor to choose from.. my favourite - their cocktails, music and food! All 10/10! Staff is super friendly, music is always on point! Keep coming here over and over again :)
